alert.note: Alert for Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 12:18PM MST until January 10 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Lost River Valley-Challis/Pahsimeroi Valleys- Including the cities of Howe, Arco, Mackay, Chilly, and Challis. * WHEN...From 8 AM Tuesday to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Lost River Valleys
